job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtThe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersampnbspCollaborate with data scientists engineers stewards on data extraction cleaning and visualizationltpgtltpgtImplement and optimize decision science models based on structured and unstructured data And work in cross geography team environment in the delivery of analytic software prototypesltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtDevelop test and produce advanced analytical methods in the agricultural domainltligtltligtCollaborate with data scientistsengineersstewards on data extraction and data cleaningltligtltligtDesign implement and optimize statistical and machine learning models based on structured and unstructured dataltligtltligtWork closely with the software engineering team data engineers and business representative in the delivery of analytic softwareltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtFluency in ltstronggtPythonltstronggt or another highlevel programming languageltligtltligtExperience developing statistical and machine learning modelsltligtltligtltstronggtPhDltstronggt in related field Statistics Geostatistics Mathematics or closely related fieldltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtPreferred Skills ltstronggtltligtltligtPrevious exposure in agriculturalbiological scientific dataltligtltligtExperience working with environmental dataltligtltligtFamiliarity working with geospatial dataltligtltligtFamiliarity with deep learning architecturesltligtltligtltbrgtltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIdeally  we would like someone who can work in person after offices reopen and it is deemed safe to do so but we WILL consider remote working for the right candidateltpgt
